name: Kill the Rules
description:
FULL SCREEN RECOMMENDED 

W,A,S,D TO CONTROL

MOBILE TOUCH SUPPORT  ✅

HOW TO PLAY THIS GAME?

THE BLOCKS IN THE GAME REPRESENT ALL THE RULES OF THE GAMEWORLD. IN ORDER TO BREAK THE RULES, YOU HAVE TO LITERALLY KNOCK THEM OFF THE EDGE. EASY-PEASY!

THE GOAL IS TO COLLECT THE PURPLE GEM. TO OPEN THE DOOR TO THE GEM, YOU HAVE TO GET THE KEY FIRST. BUT YOU CAN ALWAYS BE SMART:)

ENJOY!

Music by -Brandon Morris @ Loading screen loop | OpenGameArt.org
